rewards.rewardDescription: Complimentary domestic lounge access. Access benefits are based on spends in the previous 3 calendar months. Minimum spends required is Rs. 50,000. For newly issued cards, minimum spend criteria is waived for the month of issuance followed by the next 3 calendar months.

condition.fieldDescription: Minimum spend period for lounge access eligibility

rewards.rewardDescription: Earning Maharaja Points on spends, excluding transactions on Insurance and Gold / Jewellery categories from 20th April 2024.

condition.fieldDescription: Date from which exclusions are effective for Maharaja Points earning
